==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|げん|しゅ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=げんしゅ}} compound {{m|zh|元首|tr=ngjwon syuw<sup>X</sup>|lit=first, prime + head}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=o|げんしゅ|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|げんしゅ}}

# [[head of state]] (the chief public representative of a nation), [[ruler]], [[sovereign]]

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|元首政|げんしゅせい}}: the [[principate]], a type of [[government]] in ancient [[Rome]], established under [[w:Augustus Caesar|Augustus Caesar]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|もと|くび}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=もとくび|元|tr1=moto|t1=origin, base|首|tr2=kubi|t2=neck, head}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|もとくび}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もとくび}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=もとくび|rare}} the [[base]] of the [[neck]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=もとくび|rare}} {{qualifier|by extension upwards}} the [[head]]

=====Usage notes=====
The [[訓読み#Japanese|kun'yomi]] reading of ''motokubi'' is rare for this term.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>
